We merge the unique skills of our global ecosystem with deep tech and entrepreneurship to build deep-tech ventures that tackle grand societal challenges.
investmentAreas: Finance, Impact Investing, Venture Capital, Deep Tech, Entrepreneurship

name: HiiL Justice Accelerator
description: We are the only accelerator in the world focussed on innovating justice and SDG16. HiiL, short for The Hague Institute for Innovation of Law, takes action on innovating justice systems worldwide in the belief that innovation, when merged with research and data, can bring real change. Our mission: by 2030, 150 million people will be able to prevent or resolve their most pressing justice problems.
investmentAreas: Services, Evaluation, Evidence, Consultancy, Legal Tech

name: Horticoop
description: Horticoop is the incubator for investments in the horticultural sector. We are Horticoop, a royal investment cooperative that invests in horticultural companies that contribute to increased productivity with reduced or more sustainable use of raw materials. We focus on technological innovations in the horticultural sector, including CEA (Controlled Environment Agriculture).
investmentAreas: Horticultural technology, Cooperative, Horticulture, Investment, CEA

name: BW Ventures
description: Reach product-market fit within 100 days, with their Precelerator program. We are excited about rapid growth when innovation serves a problem/solution, product/market and product/channel fit. To arrive at the acceleration stage, we validate assumptions until we find a solution that customers are truly looking for.
investmentAreas: Lean Startup, Customer Validation, Investment, Corporate Innovation, Consulting

name: ICOS Capital Management
description: ICOS Capital is a professional venture and growth capital investment firm that has invested in over 40 European technology companies. Icos Capital is a ClimateTech Venture Capital Fund, backing ambitious founders tackling our most urgent and complex challenges. Specialising in Food systems, Chemical & Materials, Sustainable industry process & digital technologies and Decarbonization, we seek to find the biggest opportunities and most promising solutions for change.
investmentAreas: Cleantech, Water, Energy Efficiency, Venture Capital, GreenTech

name: Clever Clover
description: Clever Clover is a new Startup Accelarator in Amsterdam. Clever Clover is a unique start-up accelerator based in Amsterdam. We believe in stimulating innovation in the 'old economy'​ by creating a supportive ecosystem to help new business ideas grow and flourish. Clever Clover invests in innovative start-ups bringing something new to real world business sectors, the so-called 'old economy'​.
investmentAreas: Investment, Business Development, Sales Development, Startup Accelerator

name: ABN AMRO
description: ABN AMRO Sustainable Impact Fund invests in companies and early stage projects. ABN AMRO wants to be a better bank that contributes to a better world. We are convinced that we are a better bank if we work together with our customers and employees for a better world.
investmentAreas: Retail banking, Private banking, Corporate Banking, Sustainability

name: ACE Incubator
description: ACE Incubator is an Amsterdam-based incubator for science and high-tech startups. We support students, researchers and academics to grow their business ideas into impactful companies of the future. ACE stimulates entrepreneurship among (graduate) students, researchers, university professors and academics by offering training, support and access to an extensive network of mentors, entrepreneurs and business professionals.
investmentAreas: Entrepreneurial Education, Entrepreneurship Research, Fundraising, Venture Mentoring

name: Aimforthemoon
description: Aimforthemoon is a startup studio of entrepreneurs & corporate innovators. Together we create new products, services and startups. We are a corporate innovation studio that test, builds and scales corporate ventures and innovation strategies. We take the lead in the moonshots that change the world. By mobilizing and uniting powerful organizations, entrepreneurs and capital around impact we start and scale new beginnings.
investmentAreas: Startup Studio, Corporate Innovation, Entrepreneurship, Shared Value

name: Airbus
description: Airbus is a manufacturer of aircraft products. We pioneer sustainable aerospace for a safe and united world. We're a global team designing, manufacturing and supporting the world's leading aircraft.
investmentAreas: Aviation, Aerospace Component, Manufacturing, Aircraft Manufacturing

name: Bloomit Ventures
description: Bloomit is an active investor in and accelerator of Light Electric Vehicles (LEV). We support ambitious startups and scaleups to grow smarter and faster with hands-on participation: by and for entrepreneurs. Founded in 2020, Bloomit Ventures is a venture capital investment firm based in Maarsbergen, Netherlands.
investmentAreas: Venture Capital, Private Equity Principals, Investors, Entrepreneurs

name: Blue Sparrows MedTech Funds
description: We invest money and experience in early stage medtech companies. The Blue Sparrows MedTech Fund invests money and experience in very early-stage medtech companies. The fund is unique in the fact that besides 2 experienced fund managers, a total of 7 young entrepreneurs in medical technology are part of the fund. The aim is to use their recent experience for the purpose of the investments made in the fund.
investmentAreas: Investments, Medical Technology, Early Stage Startups, Coaching

name: Great Stuff Ventures
description:
We founded Great Stuff Ventures in 2018 with the goal to find and be inspired by the greatest technology entrepreneurs of the next decade and beyond.

We are a group of entrepreneurs and industry veterans investing their own capital in great people doing great stuff.

We help by asking the right questions and introducing you to the right people.

We focus on early business acceleration. When investing, we help you closing the round by involving our wider network of investors.

*We invest up to € 100k in seed to pre-series A rounds in companies raising between € 250k and € 1.5m. *Occasionally we also invest in later stage rounds
*We prefer to co-invest with other angel groups or early-stage VC funds
*We prefer equity deals over convertibles
investmentAreas: SaaS, hardware, energy tech, B2C, sustainability
